segments.text: Those kids are up to no good, climbing on that stool to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how reckless they're being, that stool looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, he's going to fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, like it's the most normal thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They don't seem to care about the water all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised their mom hasn't noticed them yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is almost empty, they've been at it for a while.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't break anything if they fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's plate is just hanging there, like he's trying to catch cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they need to be more careful, this is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
